resources.string: Which food would you like \n To cook ?

For Gulab Jamun:

1 cup milk powder
1/4 cup all-purpose flour 
1/4 tsp baking soda
Pinch of cardamom powder 
2 tbsp melted ghee
2-3 tbsp milk (approx.)
Chopped nuts (optional) 
Oil/ghee for frying
For Sugar Syrup:

1.5 cups sugar 
1.5 cups water
Saffron strands (optional)
1/4 tsp cardamom powder 
1 tsp rose water/essence

Make sugar syrup: Dissolve sugar in water, add saffron and cardamom. Simmer for 8-10 mins. Add rose water and set aside. 

Make dough: Mix milk powder, flour, baking soda, cardamom, and ghee. Add milk gradually to form soft dough.

Shape and fry: Roll dough into smooth balls. Heat oil/ghee, fry balls on low heat till golden. Drain and put in syrup.

Soak: Let balls soak in syrup for 1-2 hours. 

Serve: Garnish with nuts if desired. Serve warm or at room temperature. 

Enjoy your Gulab Jamun!
